content:
# The stone furnace is still working and has successfully smelted 8 iron plates from the iron ore. It currently has 5 iron ore left to process and 4 coal remaining for fuel.
# 
# Since the furnace is actively working, I can let it continue until it finishes smelting the remaining iron ore. I should keep an eye on the inventory to see how many iron plates it produces in total.

# I will wait a bit longer to allow the furnace to complete the smelting process.
sleep(10)  # Wait for another 10 seconds to see if the furnace finishes smelting.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
